review: The ads did not indicate that the unit had to be plugged into an electrical outlet after inserting into the TV HD slot.  Additionally, I expected the unit would have all of the programs that the desktop unit had, including NETFLIX.
author: elesef

review: Love this! Turned out to be perfect. I have both this and the Amazon TV box and would get this again because it's the same but cheaper
author: Chris Lesner

review: Affordable with a large variety of shows to choose from. Enjoying every minute of it.
author: Barry and Brenda Underwood

review: Works like to Box. Fast, easy to use-great price.
author: Steve

review: My Fire Stick was a gift so I am still learning.
author: chappologie

review: We also have the Chromecast  and I prefer it over the Fire stick. I think the Fire is more restricted.
author: CM "clem"

review: It  is great .  Have watched movies from Amazon with it.
author: Joyce Laughlin

review: A step up from the Chromecast that I had (and have since given to my daughter).  Getting around on the menus could be easier but, otherwise, a pretty solid product.
author: John P. Hite Jr.
